thread.title: Trump Signs Executive Order To Abolish 'Job-Killing Regulations'
thread.title_full: Trump Signs Executive Order To Abolish 'Job-Killing Regulations'

author: Jack Davis
title: Trump Signs Executive Order To Abolish 'Job-Killing Regulations'
text:
“The regulatory burden is for the people behind me and for small companies. It’s an impossible situation and we’re going to solve it very quickly,” he added. 
The White House estimated that in 2015, federal regulations cost the American economy more than $2 trillion. 
“Today this executive order directs each agency to establish a regulatory reform task force . It will ensure that every agency has a team of dedicated people to research all regulations that are unnecessary, burdensome and harmful to the economy, and harmful to the creation of jobs and business,” Trump said, noting that agencies will have 90 days to come up with regulations that should be scrapped or simplified. Advertisement - story continues below 
Trump has said that while protections for worker safety and the environment are necessary, not all regulations meet those standards. 
“Every regulation should have to pass a simple test: Does it make life better or safer for American workers or consumers. If the answer is no, we will be getting rid of it and getting rid of it quickly,” Trump said. 
Trump said “ excessive regulation is killing jobs” and “driving companies out of our country like never before.” 
“We will stop punishing companies for doing business in the United States. It’s going to be absolutely just the opposite. They’re going to be incentivized to doing business in the United States,” Trump said. Advertisement - story continues below
